title: Starbucks Unionization Efforts Slow
description:
P.M. Edition for Oct. 31. A unionization expansion at Starbucks stores is slowing down, as the coffee chain increases its perks for non-union workers, including higher salaries and expanded benefits. Restaurants reporter Heather Haddon joins host Annmarie Fertoli to discuss what’s behind the shift and what it means for the future of unionization efforts at Starbucks.
